forms.project_description_placeholder: Add a short description to help others better understand your project.

forms.format_no_svg_error: The file format is not allowed. Allowed formats: gif, png, jpg or webp

common_project.delete_modal_warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone.
common_project.delete_modal_text: This action will delete the project, along with all the stories and attachments in it.

errors.please_refresh: Please refresh the page or try again in a few minutes
errors.login: There was a problem login your account
errors.create_project: There was a problem creating your project
errors.create_workspace: There was a problem creating your workspace
errors.member_roles: There was a problem loading member roles
errors.public_permissions: There was a problem loading public permissions
errors.workspace_permissions: There was a problem loading workspace  permissions
errors.resend_email: There was a problem reseind your email
errors.save_changes: An error occurred while saving your changes
errors.generic_toast_message: Try again in a few minutes.
errors.invitation_no_longer_valid: The invitation is no longer valid.
errors.project_invitation_no_longer_valid: The invitation to {{ name }} is no longer valid.
errors.lose_story_permissions: You no longer have permissions to {{permission}} stories
errors.you_dont_have_permission_to_see: You don't have permission to see the project.
errors.admin_permission: You  are no longer admin on this project
errors.user_deleted_entity: {{user}} has deleted it, so you cannot edit it anymore.

discard_changes.title: Discard changes?
discard_changes.description: You will lose the changes you have made.

common_story.assign_key: Press enter to add or remove assignees.

field_conflict.title: Watch out! There is a new version of the {{ fieldName }}.
field_conflict.description: While you were editing the {{fieldName}}, {{user}} saved a new version. Check it out and then you can edit it if you want.
field_conflict.copy_title: Do you want to copy your changes?
field_conflict.copy_descripcion: So you can use them later.

common_members_tabs.no_pending: There are no pending invitations to accept.
common_members_tabs.last_admin_warning_title: Projects must have at least one admin.
common_members_tabs.last_admin_warning_description: Assign another admin first and try again.
common_members_tabs.leave_description: You will lose the permissions granted as a member of the project and will be removed from all your assignments.
common_members_tabs.remove_description: The user will lose the permissions granted as a member of the project and will be removed from all their assignmets.
common_members_tabs.no_longer_member: You are no longer member of the {name} {type}.

banner.alpha: This app, while amazing, is unstable. It's an Alpha version, so your data could be erased at some point. Embrace the wild, cherish every moment, and don't forget your bear repellent spray.
